body.name: AENTGIU Studless TV Wall Mount, Heavy Duty Drywall TV Bracket Hanger for 32-75 inch Flat Screen TVs, No Stud, No Drill, No Anchors, Easy Install with All Hardware Included
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 18 hrs 10 mins
features: NO-STUD TV WALL MOUNT: Wall studs not required for installation, avoid the hassle of finding studs, AENTGIU studless TV mount accommodates 32 to 75 inch TVs; Can hold up to 100 pounds in dry wall. Low profile—extends only 1.2 inch clearance from the wall for no gap and a clean appearance and can tilt up to +5 degrees

SOLID ALUMINIUM ALLOY CONSTRUCTION: Made of heavy-duty aluminium alloy for reliable strength. Keep your expensive equipment safe and secure with this reliable mount that's 3 times strength tested to support up to 150 pounds.

COMPATIBILITY: This bracket fits 32" to 75" screens with VESA 100x100 mm to 600x400mm mounting holes (The VESA mounting patterns are the distances (in mm) between the four screw holes on the back of the TV), accommodating the majority of TV models on the market. Drywall thickness must be greater than 0.4".
WONT DAMAGE WALLS: Installs with tiny picture hanging nails. Built-in bubble level and all mounting hardware included for easy installation. Installs in 10 minutes. customize your
Outstanding Service: US-based customer support team that can answer any questions you may have before purchasing or installing. Our TV mount is 10-year warranted!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars YOU WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I recently purchased the No Stud TV Wall Mount for my 40-inch TV and I couldn't be happier with my purchase. This wall mount is absolutely fantastic and I highly recommend it to anyone in need of a sturdy and reliable TV mounting solution.First and foremost, the installation process was incredibly easy and hassle-free. As the name suggests, there is no need to find a stud in the wall to mount your TV. This feature alone sets it apart from other wall mounts on the market. It saved me so much time and effort, especially since I live in an older home where finding a stud can be a challenge.The build quality of this wall mount is outstanding. It feels incredibly solid and durable. I was a bit skeptical at first, thinking it might not hold up my TV securely, but I was pleasantly surprised. It has a weight capacity of up to 55 inches, and my 40-inch TV feels rock solid on it. I have absolutely no concerns about it falling or wobbling, which gives me great peace of mind.Another aspect I appreciate about this wall mount is its versatility. It is designed to fit TVs ranging from 22 to 55 inches, making it suitable for a wide range of TV sizes. Additionally, it offers a full range of motion, allowing me to adjust the viewing angle and tilt according to my preferences. Whether I want to watch TV from my couch or my dining area, I can easily adjust the mount to get the perfect viewing angle.The design of this wall mount is sleek and minimalistic, blending in seamlessly with my living room decor. It doesn't take up much space on the wall and leaves a clean and clutter-free look. It's also worth mentioning that the package comes with all the necessary hardware and clear instructions, making the installation process even easier.Overall, I can't recommend the No Stud TV Wall Mount enough. It is a top-notch product that delivers on its promises. Its sturdy build, easy installation, versatility, and sleek design make it a must-have for anyone looking to mount their TV securely and effortlessly. If you're in the market for a TV wall mount, look no further.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Put up a 60 inch TV while the TV owner protested while watching us this will never work. Well, it did! It was so easy and holds up the TV perfectly. No more big holes and large metal holders. Thank you!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This was one of the smartest purchases I have made. It was so very easy to install and allowed me to mount my 70in. Television in my home gym on my own. It comes with a small level, which was very helpful, a hanging template, and all necessary parts for sturdy, reliable mounting. Saves so much more time and money in such a space, than hiring someone and later patching a wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars yes! soo easy to install and works great!
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical, but this is a great product! The hardest part of the installation was the measuring to make sure it was at the right height on the wall and then I also wanted to ensure it would hit as many studs as possible because I was skeptical. It is such an easy way to hang your tv, mine is 65’ and a bit on the heavy side, and it’s still holding strong…10/10 on this one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Product is great, instructions are terrible
reviews.reviewText: Once we figured out what all the screws were meant for, it went together easily, but we literally used 4 screws out of like 30. They provide screws to fit many different TV's, so you will only use 4 of them...and you'll try SO many configurations of screws, spacers, and bracket before you figure out which 4 fit correctly. The top 2 length likely won't be the same as the bottom 2. The wall strip went on really easy...lots of nails, so it is very solid without worrying about centering on a stud. I totally recommend this wall mount, just pack your patience. Total installation time was about 30 minutes...actual installation time was about 10 minutes once we figured out the screw situation.Update...Liked it so much I bought another one for a 32" tv. I bought the one for up to 55" tv's. The wall bracket is much shorter, and the tv hooks are about 1/8" from the end of the bracket. We are worried vibrations will eventually shift the tv and it will fall. Measure the distance between your tv's screw holes before nailing 20 holes in your wall.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Super easy to install. Took approximately 15 minutes. A was amazed. No stud finder need.

I mounted a 65inch heavy LED. Holds firmly. The package is amazing, all sorts of screws to fit any TV possible and two types of spacers to separate from the wall. They even give you a little level so you don't have to go looking for one or eyeball it which never works out. Excellent quality product, strongly recommend.
Easy to install and does not need a lot of time to put on the wall
Everything you need, and a lot more, is in the box. Super easy to hang the TV.

I bought the other type of stud less TV mount for my 55” TV and it was awesome. Thought I would try this type for my smaller 32” tv. It works just as great. I wish I heard of these when I hung my tv’s at my other house. I have holes all over my wall trying to find studs. I know you are supposed to use a stud finder but I didn’t have one.Just a foot note as with the other tv mount I bought they come with little levels do u hang the tv straight. Genius!!You need nothing but a hammer.
